mg4nA2WMB8d68Dy5s.name: Directional
mg4nA2WMB8d68Dy5s.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

mVVevV7xglkSVFZXd.name: Tough Skin
mVVevV7xglkSVFZXd.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

m1sNTRyp-uqJuefUh.name: Oxygen Storage
m1sNTRyp-uqJuefUh.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

mPQ3jT_o0s9JL92CI.name: Oxygen Storage
mPQ3jT_o0s9JL92CI.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

m-qZ35pAxMEWMjPKO.name: Oxygen Storage
m-qZ35pAxMEWMjPKO.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mAkEy3axKi-TsYWEr.name: Oxygen Storage
mAkEy3axKi-TsYWEr.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mA3U9FY9NRl-zzr_A.name: Oxygen Storage
mA3U9FY9NRl-zzr_A.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

mQQsGZ9vfLPA3zQvn.name: Diffuse
mQQsGZ9vfLPA3zQvn.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mZkBPLDYdIkYjbwtk.name: Homogenous
mZkBPLDYdIkYjbwtk.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mMOZ4o2_xBVxruHfp.name: No Blood
mMOZ4o2_xBVxruHfp.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mRU3xM2Fpfj4WVFQR.name: No Brain
mRU3xM2Fpfj4WVFQR.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mAN2UtMMmG6b90Qzy.name: No Eyes
mAN2UtMMmG6b90Qzy.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

msqjklcY8tSjxCLeN.name: No Head
msqjklcY8tSjxCLeN.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mYEwy88qQWbYf12Pc.name: No Neck
mYEwy88qQWbYf12Pc.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mzwewv7mD0_p8BFhp.name: No Vitals
mzwewv7mD0_p8BFhp.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mzIsa8wURSfAE3RCj.name: Unliving
mzIsa8wURSfAE3RCj.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mi3ujmlZ3j9tfSvOo.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mKf5Qs_SDR-2Fx9l3.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

m5MKoYFEWuqi0wfr3.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
